alert.note: Alert for Camden; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Western Currituck (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 9:19PM EST until December 23 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 10 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Maryland, northeast North Carolina and eastern and southeast Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 10 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds could briefly gust higher with the cold frontal passage in the morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Eastern Currituck; Pasquotank; Western Currituck
